text: Kalochori-Panteichi () is a halt, in Boeotia, Greece. The station serves the village of Kalochori-Panteichi. It is owned by OSE, but service are provided by TrainOSE, through Proastiakos from Athens to Chalcis.Proastiakos timetable 2020 ==History== The station opened on 6 April 2005 as a unstaffed intermediate station on the Athens to Chalcis service of Proastiakos. ==Facilities== The station is a unstaffed halt, with few facilities, aide from two small shelters with seating. There is no electric displays or public- address (PA) systems. The Motorway 1 passes west of the station, however there is no car parking facilities or drop off capability. ==Service== The station is served by Proastiakos, with frequent services to Athens, Oinoi and Chalcis. 24 scheduled trains call at the station daily. ==Station layout== {|table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=3 | style="width:50px; border-bottom:solid 1px gray; vertical-align:top;"|Ground level | style="width:100px; border- bottom:solid 1px gray; vertical-align:top;"| | style="width:285px; border- bottom:solid 1px gray; vertical-align:top;"|Exit |- | rowspan="3" style="border-bottom:solid 2px gray; vertical-align:top;"|Level Ε1 |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;border-right:solid 2px gray;border- left:solid 2px gray;border-bottom:solid 2px gray;" colspan=2| Side platform, doors will open on the right/left |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"|Platform 1Α |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"|→ towards (Avlida) → |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"|platform 1Β |style="border- bottom:solid 1px gray;"|→ towards (Agios Georgios) ← |} ==References== Category:Transport in Boeotia Category:Railway stations in Central Greece Category:Railway stations opened in 2005 Category:2005 establishments in Greece
title: Kalochori-Panteichi railway station
